comments.text:
using gestures to navigate away from a page which asks for confirmation to leave the page results in an unusable browser.  tested with nightly (11.0a1 (2011-12-16)).

steps to reproduce:

1. http://www.google.com.au/search?q=rage%20maker
2. click ragemaker.net hit
3. do "2-finger swipe left" to go back
4. click on 'leave page' (lots of times, it doesn't work)
5. click on 'stay on page' (a few times)

i end up with an empty modal "cancel/ok" dialog, which i can't dismiss.  someone else running nightly had their browser freeze.

i have to quit nightly, and when the session is restored, the window with the empty dialog attached isn't restored.
